about_the_game:
Enter the Pizza Heroes Arena!

Pizza Heroes is an action multiplayer team arena game. Hone your skills and clutch up for your team in a variety of fun game modes. Play for FREE now!

Choose from a variety of classes to reflect your gamestyle. Play as Warriors, Jokers, Paladins, Soul Assassins, Tank, Swordsman, Pyro Mage, Arcane Mage, Wizard and much more.

Compete solo or with friends in our 'arena mode' and move up the rankings. Or relax and have some more fun in one of our casual modes like 'Hole Hook' or 'Tavern.'

Customize your characters with a variety of limited edition traits like ears, tails and hair. Express your style with a wide range of unique outfits and accessories that let you flex on the competition!
